ðŸ“– Summary: TheoremExplainAgent (TEA) is an AI system designed to generate Manim videos that visually explain mathematical theorems. It aims to provide a deeper understanding of theorems by uncovering reasoning flaws that might be hidden in text-based explanations. The system utilizes LLM agents and multimodal explanations to create engaging and informative video content.
